title: Cherry Spice Layer Cake
ingredients: ['1 (390g) tin cherry fruit filling', '125g butter, softened', '400g caster sugar', '2 eggs', '300g plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarb of soda', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground nutmeg', '1 teaspoon ground cinnamon', '1/2 teaspoon ground cloves', '1/2 teaspoon ground allspice', '1 1/2 (300g) tubs cream cheese, softened', '225g butter, softened', '3 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon vanilla extract', '1kg sieved icing sugar']
